comment: Law combining indexed union with indexed intersection. Eq. 14 in [KuratowskiMostowski] p. 109. This theorem also appears as the last example at ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Union%5F%28set%5Ftheory%29 . (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
